statements: SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE authentication_code = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT authorized_amount, authorization_timestamp FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_auth ORDER BY authorization_timestamp DESC;
SELECT authentication_code, authorized_amount FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE authorized_amount > 50.00;
SELECT transaction_id, authorization_timestamp FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE authorization_timestamp >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
SELECT authentication_code, authorized_amount FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE authorized_amount > 1000;
SELECT authorization_timestamp, transaction_id, authorized_amount FROM contactless_payment_auth ORDER BY authorization_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM contactless_payment_auth WHERE authorization_timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_rows, SUM(authorized_amount) AS total_amount FROM contactless_payment_auth;
SELECT * FROM authorization_codes;
SELECT code_id, authorization_code FROM authorization_codes;
SELECT transaction_id, created_at FROM authorization_codes ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT code_id, authorization_code FROM authorization_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, MIN(created_at) AS earliest_created_at FROM authorization_codes;
SELECT * FROM authorization_codes WHERE code_id = 1;
SELECT authorization_code, transaction_id FROM authorization_codes WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE merchant_id = 1001 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT authorization_code, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'Completed' AND card_id = 5555;
SELECT code_id, authorization_code, transaction_id, created_at FROM authorization_codes INNER JOIN transactions ON authorization_codes.transaction_id = transactions.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM payment_authorization;
SELECT authorization_code, user_id FROM payment_authorization ORDER BY authorization_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_details WHERE user_phone = '1234567890';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_status = 'completed';
SELECT user_phone, user_email, user_name FROM user_details ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM user_details WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT authorization_code, user_id, transaction_id, authorization_time FROM payment_authorization ORDER BY authorization_time DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, user_phone FROM user_details WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date, transaction_status FROM transaction_details WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT authorization_code, transaction_id, authorization_time FROM payment_authorization WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM authorization_codes WHERE id = 1;
SELECT code, transaction_id FROM authorization_codes WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT created_at, code FROM authorization_codes WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE status = 'SUCCESS';
SELECT id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 2;
SELECT users.username, cards.card_number FROM users JOIN cards ON users.id = cards.user_id;
SELECT transactions.amount, authorization_codes.code FROM transactions JOIN authorization_codes ON transactions.authorization_code = authorization_codes.code;
SELECT * FROM authorization_codes JOIN transactions ON authorization_codes.id = transactions.id;
SELECT * FROM Users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM Users WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT card_id, card_number, expiration_date FROM Cards WHERE expiration_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount FROM Transactions WHERE payment_status = 'SUCCESS' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Users ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_amount, payment_status FROM Transactions WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT authorization_time, code FROM AuthorizationCodes WHERE authorization_time >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT Users.first_name, Users.last_name, Cards.card_number, Cards.expiration_date FROM Users JOIN Cards ON Users.user_id = Cards.user_id;
